trends: There have been 33 other sightings in Hickory
There were no other sightings in Hickory on or around November 7th 2012
divs: Sighting Detailsme my husband and children were coming home, we saw something that looked like a plane but when we got to our yard we noticed it wasnt a plane, it was stopped above our house and then took off when we pulled in like it was ruinning from us almost then took off about a mile and then it stopped again and then suddenly turned right and shot off quickly, no noises or anything, it had a triangle shape and 3 red lights on each corner of it, it also had a flashing red light between the back 2 lights, couldnt tell the color as it was dark outside but could clearly see the triangle shape of it
Summary: it was moving then stopped above our home, then shot out a mile then stopped then shot off to the right
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
